statements: SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date, donor_id FROM donors;
SELECT donation_amount, donor_name, donor_id, donation_date FROM donors;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors;
SELECT * FROM donors ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT donor_name, MAX(donation_amount) AS max_donation FROM donors GROUP BY donor_name HAVING COUNT(donation_amount) > 1;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY donor_id;
SELECT AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation, COUNT(*) AS total_donors FROM donors WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount < 500 OR donation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM donors;
SELECT donor_id, first_name, last_name FROM donors WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT donor_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT donor_id, first_name, last_name, contribution_date, amount FROM donors JOIN contributions ON donors.donor_id = contributions.donor_id;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM donors WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT donor_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM donors ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT donor_id, first_name, last_name, amount, contribution_date FROM donors JOIN contributions ON donors.donor_id = contributions.donor_id WHERE amount > 1000;

SELECT donor_id, first_name, last_name, contribution_date FROM donors JOIN contributions ON donors.donor_id = contributions.donor_id WHERE contribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT donor_name, phone_number FROM donors WHERE email IS NULL;
SELECT donor_name, amount, date_contributed FROM donors JOIN contributions ON donors.donor_id = contributions.donor_id;
SELECT d.donor_name, c.amount, dc.category_name FROM donors d JOIN contributions c ON d.donor_id = c.donor_id JOIN donation_categories dc ON c.contribution_id = dc.category_id ORDER BY c.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 3;
SELECT contribution_id, amount, date_contributed FROM contributions WHERE donor_id = 5 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, phone_number FROM donors JOIN contributions ON donors.donor_id = contributions.donor_id WHERE amount > 1000;

SELECT donor_name, amount, category_name FROM donors JOIN contributions ON donors.donor_id = contributions.donor_id JOIN donation_categories ON contributions.category_id = donation_categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors;
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, contribution_date FROM donors JOIN project_contributions ON donors.donor_id = project_contributions.donor_id;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT donor_id, project_id, contribution_amount FROM project_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 100 ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_id, first_name, last_name FROM donors;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM donors ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT donation_id, amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE last_name LIKE 'Smith%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM donors ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT d.first_name, d.email, dc.campaign_id FROM donors d JOIN donations d ON d.donor_id = dc.donor_id;
SELECT d.first_name, d.email, COUNT(dn.donation_id) AS donation_count FROM donors d LEFT JOIN donations dn ON d.donor_id = dn.donor_id GROUP BY d.first_name, d.email ORDER BY donation_count DESC;
